name: 黃秀英
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組、凸輪、齒輪、純滾動系統、鏈輪、皮帶、滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
schedule:
a. Week  b. Subject

2	Constraint Analysis
3	Four Bar Linkage
4	Inversion, Motion Limits
5	Graphical Position Analysis
6	Graphical Velocity Analysis
7	Moving Slider
8	Instant Center of Velocity
9	Midterm Exam
10	Spur Gear
11	Contact Ratio, Interference
12	Helical Gear
13	Bevel Gear
14	Simple Gear Train
15	Compound Gear Train
16	Planetary Gear Train
17	Cam
18	Final Exam
